scoringPlays.text: Jordan Chunn 6 Yd Run (Bratcher Underwood Kick)
Kaleb Barker 48 Yd Run (Bratcher Underwood PAT failed)
Kwadarrius Smith 29 Yd pass from Thomas Woodson (Tom O'Leary Kick)
Warren Ball 4 Yd Run (Tom O'Leary Kick)
Deondre Douglas 23 Yd pass from Brandon Silvers (Two-Point Pass Conversion Failed)

videos.headline: Troy RB powers in for the Touchdown
videos.description: Jordan Chunn bulldozes through for 6-yard TD

videos.headline: Troy QB calls own number for 48-yard TD
videos.description: Kaleb Barker blasts up the middle for 48-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Troy CB comes up with the INT in the end zone
videos.description: Kris Weatherspoon makes huge interception to save potential Akron TD.

videos.headline: Akron grabs the lead on RB TD run
videos.description: Warren Ball gives Akron their first lead of the night

videos.headline: Troy takes late lead with TD pass
videos.description: QB Brandon Silvers Finds Deondre Douglas for 23-yard TD.

videos.headline: Troy turnovers key late victory over
videos.description: Tiffany Greene  and Hudson Mason break down key late game plays to give Troy a 22-17 victory.
